ontology.name: Human Disease Ontology
ontology.prefix: PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-s#>

ontology.name: Protein Ontology
ontology.prefix: PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
ontology.substr: 'GO_%' or idclasse like 'SO_%' or idclasse like 'PR_%' or idclasse like 'BFO_%' or idclasse like 'NCBITaxon_%'

ontology.name: Molecule Role
ontology.prefix: PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
